act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 明天杰克过生日，我们一起去他家吧。
item.pinyin: Míngtiān jiékè guò shēngri, wǒmen yīqǐ qù tā jiā ba.

item.hanzi: 哦，明天？哎呀，我明天有课。
item.pinyin: Ō, míngtiān? Āiyā, wǒ míngtiān yǒu kè.
Nǐ míngtiān shénme shíhòu yǒu kè?

item.hanzi: 没关系，我们等你下了课一起去吧。
item.pinyin: Méi guānxi, wǒmen děng nǐ xià le kè yīqǐ qù ba.

item.hanzi: 好的，我们先去买个礼物再去他家吧。
item.pinyin: Hǎo de, wǒmen xiān qù mǎi ge lǐwù zài qù tā jiā ba.
